question: Match the following types of waves with their wavelength ranges:
| | Waves | | Wavelength ranges |
| i. | Microwave | a. | 700 nm to 400 nm |
| ii. | Visible light | b. | 1nm to 10Â³ nm |
| iii. | Ultraviolet | c. | 0.1m to 1 mm |
| iv. | X-rays | d. | 400 nm to 1 nm |
explanation: X-rays: 1nm to 10^-3 nm (matches b - though option says 10^3 nm, likely typo in source for 10^-3).
Correct match: i-c, ii-a, iii-d, iv-b.
